bibl.title: Papyrus on the Pyre. The Derveni Papyrus and Its Archeological Context. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Examines the possible interrelations between the archeological context of the Derveni papyrus and the physical and eschatological doctrines held by its author.
bibl.seg: BETEGH Gábor, Papyrus on the Pyre. The Derveni Papyrus and Its Archeological Context. Avec résumé en anglais.
Examines the possible interrelations between the archeological context of the Derveni papyrus and the physical and eschatological doctrines held by its author.
